name: Strokes (wmax)
description:
A short interactive experience about the comfort of petting during hard times in life.

This game has been developed in five days during the Game Design Workshop Inbetween Animation and Game Design at the Fantoche Filmfestival 2021 in Switzerland.

Made by:

Ning Ren - Programmer

Mike Däppen  - Designer

Aiden Khuiphum  - Designer (Insta)

Max Werner - Animator (Web)
